content.html: a nice thing about writing with less jargon is that if what I'm saying doesn't make sense, it's easy for readers to call me on it if you use a lot of impenetrable jargon, people will often think the problem is with *them* instead of with your writing
content.value:
a nice thing about writing with less jargon is that if what I'm saying doesn't make sense, it's easy for readers to call me on it

if you use a lot of impenetrable jargon, people will often think the problem is with *them* instead of with your writing
